QuestData.Title: An'dure The Giant
QuestData.Description: In order to break through Kaelynara's arcane shield, we will need a focusing crystal of rare power and quality.$b$bWithin the mine is a crystal giant known to the Draenei as An'dure. The giant has slept beneath the rocky earth for ages, but due to Kaelynara's recklessness it has awakened.$b$bThe heart of a crystal giant is a truly powerful artifact. Defeat An'Dure and return to me with a crystal giant heart. Once I have the heart, I will have everything I need to construct the focusing crystal!
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. Give me a moment and I will prepare the focusing crystal.
